amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the phaseout of personal exemptions and the overall limitation on itemized deductions and to modify the income threshold used to calculate the refundable portion of the child tax credit.

action.text: Amendment SA 2665 proposed by Senator Harkin.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2665.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2665 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 56. Record Vote Number: 346.
Amendment SA 2665 ruled out of order by the chair.
